AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.large white Ford pickup truck: vehicle driven by Brignoni-Ponce Jacquinot, stopped by United States/Mexican Border Patrol due to suspicious behavior and proximity to the United States/Mexican Border
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States/Mexican Border Patrol: agency whose agents stopped the large white Ford pickup truck driven by Brignoni-Ponce Jacquinot based on reasonable suspicion
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.U.S. District Court: court that found the totality of the circumstances provided United States/Mexican Border Patrol with reasonable suspicion to warrant the stop of the large white Ford pickup truck
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Texas Highway 385: notorious smuggling route with increased activity observed by Agent Andrew P. Graham in the prior six months, used by thousands of visitors to Big Bend National Park
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States/Mexican Border: border near which the large white Ford pickup truck was initially observed and later stopped, with its proximity being a key factor in the stop
